com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Interface KLightProjectiveType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KLightPropertiesType, KLightType, KLightWithTransformType, KTexturesRequiredType
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasicType, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KLightProjectiveWithoutShadow, KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowDiffuseOnly, KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasic, KLightProjectiveWithShadowBasicDiffuseOnly, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVariance, KLightProjectiveWithShadowVarianceDiffuseOnly

    public interface KLightProjectiveType
extends KLightWithTransformType

    The type of projective lights.

    A projective light "projects" a texture into a scene from a given position, according to the given projection matrix. The texture projected is multiplied by the given color and attenuated according to the given range and falloff values.

    Specific types of projective light may cast shadows using a variety of shadow mapping techniques.

        RException - Iff the visitor raises RException
